TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextSearch extends System.Windows.DependencyObject
Public NotInheritable Class TextSearch Inherits DependencyObject
public ref class TextSearch sealed : System::Windows::DependencyObject

summary.span: 讓使用者能透過輸入字串前置字元，快速存取集合中的項目。

span.span: Enables a user to quickly access items in a set by typing prefixes of strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別用來將字串指派給控制項的集合中的項目。This class is used to assign a string to items in a control's collection. 將字串指派給集合中每個項目可達成兩個目標。Assigning a string to each item in the collection accomplishes two objectives. 它會指定當項目，並選取它可讓使用者選取的項目輸入指定的字串時要顯示的文字。It specifies the text to display when the item is selected, and it enables the user to select an item by typing the assigned string. 例如，假設包含的集合物件，其中是狗的映像。For example, assume that a contains a collection of objects, one of which is an image of a dog. 如果您將指定字串中，"dog"四到該項目，使用者可以選取狗下拉式方塊的文字方塊中輸入文字。If you assign the string, "Dog" to that item, the user can select the dog by typing the word in the combo box's text box. 一旦使用者輸入足以區別其他項目選取範圍中的文字，將選取的狗影像。As soon as the user types enough of the word to distinguish it from other items in the selection, the image of the dog will be selected. 如果設`true`上、"Dog"會出現在文字方塊中。If is set to `true` on the , "Dog" will appear in the text box. 您可以指定使用識別項目的文字屬性在控制項上，或藉由設定控制項的集合中每個項目的屬性。You can specify the text that identifies an item by using the property on a control or by setting the property on each item in the control's collection. 設定這些屬性可確保不會顯示未預期的文字。Setting one of these properties ensures that unexpected text is not displayed. 如果您設定屬性上的控制項集合的項目，屬性將被忽略。If you set the property on a control's collection item, the property will be ignored. 如果您設定屬性設為不是實際的屬性名稱的值會被忽略。If you set the property to a value that is not the name of an actual property, is ignored. ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 您無法宣告這個 managed 的類別[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，但是您可以使用靜態屬性指派值在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but you can use its static properties to assign values in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含影像，做為項目，而不是文字的控制項。The following examples create controls that contain images as items instead of text. 在功能上，這些範例都相同。Functionally, the examples are the same. 第一個範例會設定屬性和第二個範例會設定集合中每個項目的屬性。The first example sets the property on the and the second example sets the property on each item in the collection. [!code-xaml[ComboBoxProps_snip#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxProps_snip/CS/pane1.xaml#1)] [!code-xaml[ComboBoxProps_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxProps_snip/CS/pane1.xaml#2)]
